title: New: Daniel Wilson – Please Dream Again
content:
Daniel Wilson is quite rightly beginning to gain the recognition that his songwriting and fantastic vocals deserve.

Please Dream Again, lifted from his forthcoming EP, Young Rubbish, is more experimental than Will You, which earned him praise towards the end of last year, harking back more to the initial Soundcoud demos that put him onto our radar. Layering his soulful vocals with dreamy, otherworldly synths, Wilson is rapidly proving he’s one to watch in 2014.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
